entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 6 along the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 10 except 6 along the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023
